cards.name: Bonesaw
cards.text: If a friendly creature was destroyed this turn, Bonesaw enters play ready.

cards.name: Dark Minion
cards.text:
Enhance D.
Destroyed: Deal 1D to each enemy creature.

cards.name: Imp-losion
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature and an enemy creature.

cards.name: Sinder
cards.text:
Taunt.
Reap: Destroy a friendly creature.

cards.name: Snarette
cards.text:
At the end of your turn, capture 1A.
Action: Move each A from Snarette to the common supply.

cards.name: Stirring Grave
cards.text: Play: Archive a creature from your discard pile.

cards.name: Waking Nightmare
cards.text:
Enhance Capture.
Play: Keys cost +1A for each Dis creature in play during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Break-key
cards.text: Play: If your opponent has forged more keys than you, unforge an opponent's key.  If you unforge an opponent's key this way, your opponent gains 6A.

cards.name: Double Doom
cards.text: Play: Return an enemy creature to its owner's hand.  Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

cards.name: Essence Scale
cards.text: Action: Destroy a friendly creature.  If you do, ready and use a friendly creature that shares a house with the destroyed creature.

cards.name: Hystricog
cards.text:
Enhance D D D.
Action:  Destroy a damaged creature.

cards.name: Desire
cards.text:
Keys cost +4A.
Reap: Forge a key at current cost, reduced by 1A for each friendly Sin creature.

cards.name: Envy
cards.text:
Elusive.
Reap: If there are 2 or more friendly Sin creatures, capture all of your opponent's A.

cards.name: Pride

Reap: Discard a card from your hand.  If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Diametric Charge

cards.name: Eclectic Inquiry
cards.text: Play: Archive the top 2 cards of your deck.

cards.name: Lethologica
cards.text: Play: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a Logos card or run out of cards.  If you discard a Logos card this way, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Munchling
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Fight: You may discard a Logos card from your hand or archives.  If you do, gain 1A.

cards.name: Opposition Research
cards.text:
Enhance D.
Play: Enemy creatures cannot reap during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Q-Mechs
cards.text:
Play: Draw a card.
Destroyed: Archive Q-Mechs.

cards.name: Chronus
cards.text:
Enhance Draw Draw.

After you resolve a Draw bonus icon, you may archive a card.

cards.name: Mutagenic Serum
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Mutagenic Serum. You may use friendly Mutant creatures this turn.

cards.name: Novu Dynamo
cards.text: At the start of your turn, you may discard a Logos card from your hand or archives.  If you do, gain 1A.  Otherwise, destroy Novu Dynamo.

cards.name: Adaptoid
cards.text:
Enhance Capture D Draw.
When you play a card with a bonus icon, Adaptoid gains your choice of +2 armor, Assault 2, or "Fight: Steal 1A", until end of turn. ??? (translated from Polish)

cards.name: Cyber-Clone
cards.text: Play: Purge another creature.  Until Cyber-Clone leaves play, it has power equal to the purged creature's power, and gains that creature's armor, keywords, and traits.

cards.name: Mind Over Matter
cards.text: Play:  Put each creature into its owner's archives.

cards.name: It's Coming...
cards.text: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for either half of a gigantic creature, reveal it, and put it into your hand.  Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Dino-Bot

Assault 2.

cards.name: Mad Prophet Gizelhart
